text.div:
Questionnaire FEMA System

A Code System for questionnaire fields defined by FEMA used in The SANER Project

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/QuestionnaireSystemFEMA defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
collectionDate Date being reported
state State of facility reporting
county County of facility reporting
totalOrdersIncrease New Diagnostic Tests Ordered/Received
totalOrders Cumulative Diagnostic Tests Ordered/Received
totalTestResultsIncrease New Tests Resulted
rejected Cumulative Specimens Rejected
totalTestResults Cumulative Tests Performed
positiveIncrease New Positive COVID-19 Tests
positive Cumulative Positive COVID-19 Tests
positiveIncreasePercent Number of new positive test results / number of total new tests released for previous date queried.
positivePercent Number of total positive results to released date / number of total test results released to date.

name: QuestionnaireSystemFEMA
title: Questionnaire FEMA System
description: A Code System for questionnaire fields defined by FEMA used in The SANER Project

concept.display: Number of new positive test results / number of total new tests released for previous date queried.
Number of total positive results to released date / number of total test results released to date.
